jobs.title: Workbefy
jobs.description: This mobile application aims to put you in contact with people who need especific services: Cleaning, plumbing, automotive mechanics, among other professions.

jobs.title: Ionic Ethereum Wallet
jobs.description: This mobile application aims to consult wallets within the Ethereum Network through the Infura interface, it shows the number of transactions made and how much ETH has in the wallet.

jobs.title: Awesome boilerplate netcore
jobs.description: This is a boilerplate made with net core 3.1 and Entity Framework, thought to reduce the development time when creating new projects in .Net Core.

jobs.title: Pomodoro Timer
jobs.description: This web application is a mobile app that helps you to apply the Pomodoro Technique when completing a list of things to do.

jobs.title: Bluely Studios web page
jobs.description: Responsible of developing a web page for Bluely Studios with Ionic and Angular.
